title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here you will find answers to the most common questions about our services. If you have any additional questions, do not hesitate to contact us.

questions.question: What does a Content Media Manager do?
questions.answer: The Content Media Manager designs, coordinates, and supervises the brand's digital content strategy: plans the editorial calendar, creates and adapts texts, images, and videos, manages distribution on online channels, and performs constant maintenance and updating of content to ensure coherence, quality, and engagement.

questions.question: What does a Media Manager do?
questions.answer: I am responsible for planning, buying, and optimizing advertising space in digital media (display, social ads, video, audio) to maximize the ROI and reach of your campaigns.

questions.question: On which platforms do I usually work?
questions.answer: Maintenance and content creation for Facebook/Facebook Ads, Instagram/Instagram Ads, Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, YouTube, TikTok according to your target audience.

questions.question: What does a Social Content Manager do?
questions.answer: The Social Content Manager manages and maintains specific content for social networks: publishes, schedules, and moderates posts, interacts with the community, analyzes engagement metrics, and adjusts the content strategy to optimize the brand's presence on each platform.

questions.question: How do I define the media strategy?
questions.answer: The process to define the media strategy begins with a detailed analysis of your objectives and audience. Then, I select the optimal channels that best adapt to your target audience. I continue with the precise configuration of the campaigns and finish with a monitoring system and continuous adjustments to maximize results.

questions.question: How do I measure the success of a campaign?
questions.answer: With customized KPIs (CPC, CPA, CTR, ROAS) and periodic reports in which we review results, learnings, and next steps.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: For web: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JS or React, Next.js, Astro.js, and CMS like WordPress, Prestashop, Sanity or custom Backend such as Laravel or Strapi. For apps: React Native to create multi-platform apps (iOS, Android, web), according to performance and scalability needs.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: The development process follows a structured methodology that begins with the detailed definition of requirements. I continue with architecture design and layout and prototyping. Then comes the development phase, followed by exhaustive testing and quality control. Finally, we carry out the production deployment ensuring a smooth transition.

questions.question: How long does a typical project take?
questions.answer: A static corporate website (without Backend or CMS) usually takes between 4 and 8 weeks. A static corporate website (with Backend or CMS) usually takes between 6 and 8 weeks. A mobile app takes 2 to 4 months, depending on functionalities and complexity.

questions.question: Do you offer maintenance and support?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer monthly support plans (updates, backups, improvements, and incident resolution) to keep your project always up to date.

questions.question: How do you ensure the security of the website/app?
questions.answer: I implement good coding practices, SSL certificates, vulnerability analysis, and penetration testing before each launch.

questions.question: What is your design and UX process?
questions.answer: The design and UX process begins with in-depth user research to understand their needs. Then I develop wireframes and prototypes that visualize the structure. I continue with detailed visual design and conduct usability tests to validate the experience. Finally, I implement adjustments until achieving the final version that fully satisfies the project objectives.

questions.question: How do you integrate brand identity into the design?
questions.answer: Starting from your mission, values, and communication tone, I create color palettes, typography, and icons that reinforce your personality.

questions.question: What deliverables do you include?
questions.answer: Editable files (Figma/Sketch), style guides, interactive prototypes, and specifications for developers.

questions.question: How many rounds of revision do you offer?
questions.answer: I include up to 3 design revisions to ensure that the result matches 100% with your expectations.

questions.question: What tools do you use?
questions.answer: Figma, Sketch, Adobe Illustrator, and testing tools like Maze or Lookback to validate the user experience.
